dict.string: Our work is the presentation of our capabilities.
When it becomes more difficult to suffer than to change... you will change.
Change occurs in direct proportion to dissatisfaction, but dissatisfaction never changes.
Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
Courageous people do not fear forgiving, for the sake of peace.
Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
Much of the debate over global warming is predicated on fear, rather than science.
If you want to see the true measure of a man, watch how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
All animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others.
All growth is a leap in the dark, a spontaneous unpremeditated act without benefit of experience.
Experience is the child of thought, and thought is the child of action.
An essential aspect of creativity is not being afraid to fail.
Failure is not fatal, but failure to change might be.
There is no failure except in no longer trying.
We climb to heaven most often on the ruins of our cherished plans, finding our failures were successes.
Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
Family is the most important thing in the world.
Memories are the key not to the past, but to the future.
The secret of your future is hidden in your daily routine.
The past is a ghost, the future a dream, and all we ever have is now.
There are three ingredients in the good life: learning, earning and yearning.
Good judgment comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment.
Nobody minds having what is too good for them.
Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.
Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.
To become truly great, one has to stand with people, not above them.
Seek not greatness, but seek truth and you will find both.
Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
If you're happy, if you're feeling good, then nothing else matters.
Those who do not remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
History is not a burden on the memory but an illumination of the soul.
Hope in reality is the worst of all evils because it prolongs the torments of man.
We must rediscover the distinction between hope and expectation.
All kids need is a little help, a little hope and somebody who believes in them.
Humor does not diminish the pain - it makes the space around it get bigger.
You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
The man who has no imagination has no wings.
All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.
To imagine is everything, to know is nothing at all.
The only thing that comes to a sleeping man is dreams.
One of the most sincere forms of respect is actually listening to what another has to say.
Nothing is more despicable than respect based on fear.
To the living we owe respect, but to the dead we owe only the truth.
We are healed from suffering only by experiencing it to the full.
Only the broken-hearted know the truth about love.
There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.
In a society that tries to standardize thinking, individuality is not highly prized.
The trouble with the rat race is that even if you win, you're still a rat.
If society fits you comfortably enough, you call it freedom.
There's only one thing that can kill the movies, and that's education.
It is the false shame of fools to try to conceal wounds that have not healed.
A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
Flying is learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss.
In youth we learn; in age we understand.
I never learned from a man who agreed with me.
It is what we know already that often prevents us from learning.
Laws are spider webs through which the big flies pass and the little ones get caught.
In the Halls of Justice the only justice is in the halls.
Anybody who thinks talk is cheap should get some legal advice.
Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
Nobody got where they are today by living for tomorrow.
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
Do what you love and the money will follow.
There are people who have money and people who are rich.
A man in debt is so far a slave.
Anybody who thinks money will make you happy, hasn't got money.
Poverty makes you sad as well as wise.
Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
Lose an hour in the morning, and you will spend all day looking for it.
Moving on, is a simple thing, what it leaves behind is hard.
Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.
The world's most famous and popular language is music.
If you want to make beautiful music, you must play the black and the white notes together.
Every flower is a soul blossoming in nature.
On earth there is no heaven, but there are pieces of it.
The stars that have most glory have no rest.
One touch of nature makes the whole world kin.
There is nothing in a caterpillar that tells you it's going to be a butterfly.
Wise to resolve, and patient to perform.
Patience and tenacity are worth more than twice their weight of cleverness.
Patriotism is the willingness to kill and be killed for trivial reasons.
Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
Sometimes the most positive thing you can be in a boring society is absolutely negative.
Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
The more refined and subtle our minds, the more vulnerable they are.
Every moment is a golden one for him who has the vision to recognize it as such.
The task of the modern educator is not to cut down jungles, but to irrigate deserts.
Only one person in a million becomes enlightened without a teacher's help.
A self-taught man usually has a poor teacher and a worse student.
Everybody gets so much information all day long that they lose their common sense.
IMPORTANT!! THIS ENTRY MUST BE LAST
This quote will not show. Serves as a filler for our shuffle code. MAKE SURE THIS IS THE LAST ENTRY
